page.title: 15Hellaby Industrial Estate.
page.content: First we drove down to the old house which is called{Hellaby Hall.}We all went in Mr.Boulding's car.He parked on the side of the road. Then we went to the gate. Then we walked across the road and looked over the wall. On one of the walls we saw a notice. It said DonBridge Re_Cycling work shop. Then we went back to the car. We went up the road a bit and we saw a lorry with paint spilling out onto the road. We had a look at the{warehouses and made notes on paper.Then we went up further. Mr.Boulding told us to write{Industrial Storage N.M.T Estate. Then we turned onto another Street and we saw Logic Office Furniture. Other firms include{window manufacturing, {welding, engineering, and plastics {manufacturing. Access to major roads is easy so they can distribute their goods Nationwide.
